str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From pros and erchomai; to approach, i.e. come near, visit, or worship, assent to.

word: [ a mountain that ] can be touched
parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: From the base of psallo; to manipulate, i.e. Verify by contact; figuratively, to search for.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: To ignite, light, burn, lit. and met; I consume with fire. Apparently a primary verb; to set on fire, i.e. Kindle or consume.
Fire; the heat of the sun, lightning; fig: strife, trials; the eternal fire. A primary word; 'fire'.
Darkness, gloom; a thick cloud. Akin to nephos; gloom.
Darkness, murkiness, gloom. Akin to the base of nephos; gloom.
A storm, tempest, whirlwind. From thuo a storm.
